sentences.en: A centimeter can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 一厘米可以无穷尽地分成更小的单位。

sentences.en: During the 1980s monster publishing houses started to swallow up smaller companies.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代，一些出版巨头开始吞并一些较小的公司。

sentences.en: Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules.
sentences.cn: 在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。

sentences.en: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.cn: 大型超市的掠夺性价格正威胁着小商店的生计。

sentences.en: The average European kitchen is smaller than its American cousin.
sentences.cn: 欧式的厨房一般比美式厨房小。

sentences.en: The band are playing a handful of shows at smaller venues.
sentences.cn: 乐队要在小一点的场馆举办几场演出。

sentences.en: The competition became so keen that many of smaller companies were frozen out.
sentences.cn: 竞争是如此激烈，许多较小的公司被排挤了出来。

sentences.en: The level of expertise and helpfulness is far higher in smaller shops.
sentences.cn: 规模较小的商店专业得多，对顾客也体贴得多。

sentences.en: The police wanted to separate them into smaller groups.
sentences.cn: 警察想把他们拆散成几小股。

sentences.en: The smaller lake ranges from five to fourteen feet in depth.
sentences.cn: 小一些的湖深度从5英尺到14英尺不等。

sentences.en: The time delay would be smaller by eight orders of magnitude.
sentences.cn: 如果按8个数量级来看，延时量会显得小一些。

sentences.en: Their smaller rival is battling to end their duopoly.
sentences.cn: 规模更小的竞争对手正为结束他们的两强垄断局面而抗争着。

sentences.en: This means smaller banks can cream off big profits during lending booms.
sentences.cn: 这意味着在贷款业务剧增时小银行能够获得大笔利润。

sentences.en: This pub was of a very different type, smaller, less pretentious.
sentences.cn: 这个酒吧风格独特，面积不大，比较低调。

sentences.en: To the side of the large star is a smaller star.
sentences.cn: 大星星旁边是一颗小一点的星星。

sentences.en: Well, maybe it would be easier to start with a smaller problem.
sentences.cn: 那么，也许从小问题入手会更容易些。

sentences.en: Why is the company going downmarket and developing smaller machines?
sentences.cn: 为什么公司要面向低端市场开发更小的机器？

sentences.en: With the changes in the world's climate, dinosaurs died, but many smaller animals lived on. It was the survival of the fittest.
sentences.cn: 随着世界气候的变迁， 恐龙绝迹了， 但许多较小的动物却继续活了下来。 这就是适者生存。

trans.tran_cn: 更小的，小的( small的比较级 )，小气的，（服装、食品、家用设施等）小号的，小规模的
